name: Travel Riddles: Trip To Greece - quest for Greek artifacts in a free matching puzzle game
name_original: Travel Riddles: Trip To Greece - quest for Greek artifacts in a free matching puzzle game
description:
Ancient Greece awaits you with its riddles and challenging puzzles.

Collect more than 90 artifacts on the awesome match-3 levels while travelling to the most beautiful sights. Mighty power-ups will help you to set the highest score.

Each new level is more difficult than the last, so prepare for an exciting time!
Your journey around the world continues! Welcome to Greece!

Features:
- 8 new episodes
- Enchanting music
- Beautiful locations
